title: 92/38/EEC: Commission Decision of 12 December 1991 approving the programme of measures submitted by the Irish Government in 1991 on special support for the development of agricultural statistics in Ireland (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 12 December 1991  approving the programme of measures submitted by the Irish Government in 1991 on special support for the development of agricultural statistics in Ireland  (Only the English text is authentic)  (92/38/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme of measures on special support for the development of agricultural statistics in Ireland submitted by the Irish Government in 1991 is approved.
This Decision is addressed to Ireland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 December 1991. For the Commission
Henning CHRISTOPHERSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 186, 16. 7. 1988, p. 39. (2) OJ No L 359, 8. 12. 1989, p. 5.
